name: Globalperiodtracker
0:
”Alexa open global period tracker”
”Add period date for 26th October 2021”
”When is my next period”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: global period tracker
des:
Add your menstrual dates to enable tool to estimate your next menstrual period.
eg. "Add period date for 26th October 2021"

Features are:
* Can list your recent menstrual dates 
* Determine your last period date
* Determine your next period date and how many days until your next period - will average the number of days in the period data to estimate your next period date.

* You have the ability to delete all your period data.

eg. "List all my dates"
"When was my last period?"
"When is my next period."
"Delete period data"

For display screens, a period dashboard can be displayed. Menu options such as "Last Period", "Next Period", "All Dates", "Delete Data" will be displayed. 

To initiate the dashboard:
eg "Period dashboard"

For "All Dates" option, voice only devices will utter the period dates if there is less than 6 dates.
Display screens can list all your period data.

eg "Get my period data"

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
